definitions.text: a sea nymph (part woman and part bird) supposed to lure sailors to destruction on the rocks where the nymphs lived
examples: Odysseus ordered his crew to plug their ears so they would not hear the Siren's fatal song

definitions.text: a woman who is considered to be dangerously seductive
a warning signal that is a loud wailing sound
an acoustic device producing a loud often wailing sound as a signal or warning
eellike aquatic North American salamander with small forelimbs and no hind limbs; have permanent external gills
